sentences.en: A store offering mobile phone applications for the Android software system also remains on hold.
sentences.cn: 一家为Android软件 系统提供手机应用程序的商店也仍处于等待状态.

sentences.en: Actually, I like being an android.
sentences.cn: 事实上，我喜欢做个机器人。

sentences.en: Android is already closing the gap with the market leader.
sentences.cn: Android已经明显的缩小了与市场领头羊的差距.

sentences.en: Apart from handsets running on Microsoft, it now also has phones running on Android, Google's platform.
sentences.cn: 除了基于微软(Microsoft)的手机, 它现在还有基于谷歌(Google) 平台Android的 手机.

sentences.en: Dell's first smartphone, for example, will run on the Android platform.
sentences.cn: 例如, 戴尔的首款智能手机将运行Android操作系统.

sentences.en: Developers can create applications for the platform using the Android SDK.
sentences.cn: 开发人员可以利用AndroidSDK开发这个平台下的应用程序.

sentences.en: I have extensively tested nearly all Android phones to date.
sentences.cn: 我已经广泛使用了至目前为止的所有Android手机.

sentences.en: I'm part of an android football team.
sentences.cn: 我是机器人足球队的一员.

sentences.en: If you want an Android phone right now, get a Nexus One.
sentences.cn: 如果你想现在入手一台Android手机, 买NexusOne吧.

sentences.en: If you want to know how to develop applications for Android, you're in the right place.
sentences.cn: 如果您想了解如何为Android平台 开发应用程序, 您算是找对地方了.

sentences.en: Motorola this month likewise un - veiled its first Android - powered smartphone.
sentences.cn: 摩托罗拉(Motorola)本月也推出了首款运行Android操作系统的智能手机.

sentences.en: The body brain would be the larger and would control the android.
sentences.cn: 较大的身体大脑用于控制机器人.

sentences.en: The search giant has been developing the Android operating system, originally to run end cell phones.
sentences.cn: 该搜索巨人正在发展Android操作系统, 该系统最初只服务于高端手机.

sentences.en: This would be a lot easier if my android bodies were back on - line.
sentences.cn: 如果我的机器人在后面支撑,这将是一件非常轻松的事.

sentences.en: University students from all around the country brought their android friends to participate in the competition.
sentences.cn: 来自全国各地的大学生们带着他们的机器人朋友来参加本次比赛。

sentences.en: You are a modified Type 3 maintenance android fashioned to look like my A. I. persona.
sentences.cn: 你是被改进的3号类型机器人样式是暂时型号.

trans.tran_cn: 机器人，基于Linux平台的开源手机操作系统，主要使用于便携设备。目前尚未有统一中文名称，中国大陆地区较多人称为安卓
trans.tran_en: a  robot  that looks completely human
